title: Rey Rivera /// Part 2 /// 430
description:
Rey Rivera /// Part 2 /// 430

Part 2 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

In July of this year an old favorite of armchair sleuths made it’s long awaited return to television and streaming to your favorite device. Unsolved Mysteries kicked off their return with the mysterious death of 32 year old Rey Rivera. The episode was titled "Mystery on the Rooftop.” Now this story has everyone talking, including Nic & The Captain. Join us in the Garage for a couple of cold ones and a lot of mystery.
Beer of the Week - Bonfire Imperial Porter by Napa Smith Brewery Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5

True Crime Garage is very happy to be a part of True Crime Week. Stitcher's hosting True Crime Week, where they're showcasing the creepiest and most gruesome True Crime podcasts, including ours. Download the Stitcher app and check out their curated homepage to find your next True Crime Pod obsession. And don’t forget: Stitcher's the only place to listen to our older Archive episodes. And if you sign up for Stitcher Premium, you'll get access to our bonus episodes too. Just go to stitcherpremium.com and sign up with the code 'GARAGE'. And go check out

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
